tasks.title: Create Sequence Diagrams for Fault Tolerance and Communication Modes
tasks.description: Develop the required sequence diagrams to visualize fault tolerance mechanisms and clarify communication modes and timings.

tasks.title: Test Architectures and Conduct POC for Agent's Version Control
tasks.description: Perform testing on the four developed architectures and conduct a proof of concept for the agent's version control capabilities.

tasks.title: Establish Strategy for Prompt Injection Frequency
tasks.description: Develop a clear strategy for determining how often prompts should be injected—per chat or session—to optimize performance.

tasks.title: Implement System Prompt Formatting Changes
tasks.description: Make necessary formatting changes in the design of system prompts, including the use of dynamic placeholders.

tasks.title: Update Agent State Formats
tasks.description: Modify agent state formats to ensure dynamic representation is compatible across different UIs and agent configurations.

tasks.title: Create Robust Prompt Creation System for Agents
tasks.description: Develop a personalized prompt creator for each agent, ensuring it adapts based on available tools and configurations.

tasks.title: Plan Next Steps for State Streaming and Continuous UI Enhancement
tasks.description: Outline the next actions for improving state streaming functionality and user interface interaction based on co-pilot implementation.

tasks.title: Schedule Follow-Up Meeting
tasks.description: Organize a follow-up meeting to review progress on diagrams, tests, and alignment with expected outcomes.

tasks.title: Assign Team Members to Major Tasks
tasks.description: Designate specific team members to oversee significant tasks, particularly those involving prompt creation and state streaming.

tasks.title: Set Timeline for Implementation and Testing
tasks.description: Establish a timeline for the implementation and testing phases to ensure thorough coverage of all elements discussed.
